full_summary:
Adhoc Printing Services for ESDC RFSO
==============================

**Request for Standing Offer for Adhoc Printing Services**

**Governing Body**
----------------

* Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC)
* Service Canada (Strategic Services Branch (SSB), Program Delivery Branch (PDB), Citizen Services Branch (CSB), Benefits Delivery Services Branch (BDSB), and Management Services Branch (MSB))

**Rationale for Hire**
--------------------- 

To support the production of printed products for the needs of Service Canada employees and the public, we are seeking a contract for ad-hoc printing services. The SSB coordinates and develops various printing projects according to operational requirements.

**Scope of Work**
-----------------

* Delivery of printed products within specified timeframes (excluding weekends and statutory holidays)
	+ Standard Service: 24 hours
	+ Rush Service: 4 hours
	+ Urgent Service: 2 hours
* Production of printed products according to client requirements

**Tender Overview**
------------------

Up to two standing offers are anticipated to be awarded. Each standing offer will be assigned a ranking, and the user will contact the highest-ranked offeror to determine if it can meet the requirement. Standing offers will be from the date of award to March 31, 2024, with the option to extend for three additional one-year periods.

**Key Dates**
-------------

* Tender closing date: September 19, 2022, at 2:00 PM EDT
* Expected contract start date: None
* Expected contract end date: None

**Attachments**
--------------

* [PDF documents](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/16/fb788f00a36469ca6e0d2968f9f6fdb7/100019095_-_printing_services_rfso_eng.pdf)

**Notice Posting**
-----------------

This tender announcement has been posted in English and French on the [Government of Canada's Buyandsell.gc.ca website](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/).

**Please Note**

* This tender is subject to all applicable laws and policies.
* The successful bidder will be required to provide the services as outlined above.

Contact Information
------------------

* For more information, please contact:
	+ Polataiko, Mykola
	+ Email: [mykola.polataiko@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca](mailto:mykola.polataiko@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca)
